title: Silent Hill 2 playthrough — Part 2
description: This game had a really interesting story. The Silent Hill lore is neat, because it's a big thing that makes almost no sense and you have to try and make some sense of it. I think this game got a lot better in the second half. I enjoyed the fact that the story was more of a personal story for James, whereas Silent Hill 1 was more about the town and the cult.
